title: Social Problem-Solving Competency Strengthening Through Failure Case-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Learners analyze failure cases from real-world social problem-solving processes to develop reflective thinking and problem-solving strategies. Includes asynchronous collaboration using personal devices and incorporation of expert feedback

learning_goals: Learners improve critical thinking skills by analyzing at least three core causes in failure case studies.
Learners incorporate improvements for failure cases into project deliverables by elaborating on expert feedback.
Learners compare and synthesize failure response strategies from diverse perspectives through peer evaluation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
